channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:39 Air anxiety in Zolotonskyi District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:39 Air anxiety in Zolotonskyi District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
